name: Antirhythm
description:
Press E or F for the left track and I or J for the right track.

A cursed/unpleasant (but hopefully unique) experience for one or two players. 

An anti-rhythm game consisting of two instances of a simple single-track rhythm game, superimposed on one another. 

Songs chosen for rhythm-game-y-ness, meme value, contrast, or my own preference.

Made with Benny Kok's Rhythm Game Starter.

Made in one week based on the prompt "Duet" for Prototype Studio at the NYUGC.
